title: Project Management - Resolve Project Issue
description: A project is at risk of delay because a piece of hardware ordered for the project has a long lead time.

tasks.description: Identify the project task that is blocked by the hardware delay.
tasks.expected_outcome: The PM identifies the critical path task.

tasks.description: Contact multiple suppliers to try and find an alternative source for the hardware or a suitable substitute.
tasks.expected_outcome: The PM finds a different supplier who has a similar model in stock.

tasks.description: Get client approval for the substitute hardware and update the project plan accordingly.
tasks.expected_outcome: The project is put back on track by proactively resolving the supply chain issue.
